𒌓𒁺 ud-du •wood
𒌓𒁺 a log, beam
⇔
𒌓𒁲𒂊𒈜𒉿 ud-di e-lip-pi wood al ship'
𒌓𒁲𒂊𒈜𒉿 plank of a boat
